AnalystsTest.Text:
11/25/2013 3:46:26 PM
What, as per you, is the role of developing and emerging countries in reviving the current global economic conditions?

 

I Feel the countries which are developing have a proper planning and implementation in place.

Coordination,Perfect planning,various methods and innovative ideas to put into practise and implementation,taking into consideration the tools and technoligies required to develop economic  conditions of the emerging countries.
